title: multi arch version not mentioned (adding /x86_64-linux-gnu after /lib)

content.raw:
Hi,

in the tutorials the mutli arch version of ubuntu is not mentioned, heaving the possibility of /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu as install place of the libraries. This might lead to problems when installing gazebo from source and setting the `PKG_CONFIG_PATH`:

`export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=<install_path>/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/pkgconfig:$PKG_CONFIG_PATH`

or when running the ldconfig on:

`echo '/usr/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu' | sudo tee /etc/ld.so.conf.d/gazebo.conf`

Cheers
